name: The Good Chicken
description:
You've always wanted to play a chicken game. This is exactly what you're looking for.

PvP, 2D chicken fighting. You're getting a simple multiplayer experience. The PvP mode features chicken items to use against each opponent. If you're lucky, you'll find the golden egg!

Up to four players can play against each other, in multiple maps, and multiple PvP modes. Modes include getting the most kills in a certain amount of time, or getting a certain amount of kills.

You know, there's not much else. It's chickens fighting chickens. Only one of you will emerge as The Good Chicken.

Note that this is early access, and new game modes and more complex gameplay is in the works. But the core PvP experience is ready to try out! Feedback is important to me, and I'd like to know your experience.
